pages.text:
Oleta River Adventures Private Events Group Outings and Tailored Experiences at Oleta River State Park Looking to plan an unforgettable day in nature? Oleta River Adventures offers group experiences that go beyond the ordinary. Whether you're organizing a corporate event, school field trip, or birthday party, our team will help you create a meaningful outdoor escape that fits your group’s needs. Located inside beautiful Oleta River State Park, we design custom outings for all group sizes with plenty of flexible options. Choose from guided paddling tours, beachside fun, and more, with add-ons available to make your day even more special. Turn your next group event into a one-of-a-kind outdoor experience at Oleta River Adventures. (786)-274-7945 3400 NE 163rd Street North Miami Beach Your Name Phone Number Email Address Intrested In Tours Reservations Rentals Careers General Questions Private Events Your Message
Gallery

Additional required wrapper Slides Additional required wrapper Slides Ilan Bortnik Nice place, easy to arrive and very friendly staff, I got to meet Tony, the manager of the kayaking place and was very nice getting to know him and to have the kayaking experience, unfortunately the weather forces us to go back after about an hour but, it was worth and best part they charge when you’re back so you don’t have to pre pay for time that maybe you’re not going to be there or either way if you got to extend the experience you don’t have to do 2 times the same process. Hope to be back next time in Miami. Ricardo Efraín González Torres It is a very beautiful, fun place, you can do different outdoor activities, the place is wonderful to spend a different day. Moe Awesome mountain biking trails for this area. I really didn’t think id find anything decent but I had a great time and the rest of the park is also gorgeous and a vibe! Jason C What an amazing time we had. From the staff at the desks to the kayaking it was awesome. We got to see 3 manatee on our way to Raccoon Island which was an added bonus. Even we got to the island we didn’t see any raccoons but it was noisy. We walked into the island a little bit and we had 5 come up to us and we fed them. One actually stole my bag of treats and took out his own treat and left the bag. Later on we were in the water and turned around and one of the little guys from earlier was going through our kayak looking for more food lol. It is really an awesome time. Great for kids and family. Janean wagner My husband and I rented single kayaks for enjoying a paddle in the park and to sand spur island to meet the friendly raccoons. It did not disappoint. The paddle is a definite workout especially across the bay but worth every drop of sweat to meet the friendly masked bandits. They loved the red grapes and bananas (they seemed the favorites). The paddle back to the launch wasn’t near as bad. The staff was very friendly and super helpful with all my questions, not to mention amazing customer service. 10/10 would recommend to anyone wanting a fun paddle in the Miami area. Julia Stutzman Oleta River Adventures and State Park is a refreshing little piece of quiet nature nestled in the middle of concrete chaos. The staff are friendly, kind and accommodating. Our entire kayakiing experience from start to finish was enjoyable. Honestly, the patient staff members were awesome! Simon Dayan A friend and I did the two hour long kayaking tour and it was a great activity to spend a beautiful morning on the water. Our tour guide was very informative and fun and showed her love and passion for nature. I will definitely come back next time I'm in town to try paddle boarding! Oleta River Adventures Hear from 5000 + Reviews Situated along the scenic Oleta River and Biscayne Bay, Oleta River State Park offers its visitors the perfect setting for doing everything from kayaking, canoeing, paddleboarding or mountain biking to a wonderful relaxing meal and refreshing drink. It is indeed an incredibly rare opportunity to Get Away from It ALL in the Middle of It ALL! Book Now 4.7 Rating

4.7 Rating

Simon Dayan A friend and I did the two hour long kayaking tour and it was a great activity to spend a beautiful morning on the water. Our tour guide was very informative and fun and showed her love and passion for nature. I will definitely come back next time I'm in town to try paddle boarding!

Contact/FAQ Oleta River Adventures 855-526-5382 3400 NE 163rd Street North Miami Beach Your Name Phone Number Email Address Intrested In Tours Reservations Rentals Careers General Questions Private Events Your Message Frequently Asked Questions 01 Where in the park are you located? Oleta River Adventures is located 1 mile South of the Ranger Station. It is the only 2-story building in the park. You will notice the kayak launch site across from our building. Continue to drive on that same road until you reach Parking Lot #1 where you can park your vehicle while you are enjoying the rental. 02 What time do you open/close? We open at 9am on the weekdays and 8am on the weekends. We close 1 hour prior to the park's closing time, which is sunset 03 How long does it take to reach Sandspur Island, also known as Sandspur is located in the Intercoastal Waterway. It takes 30-40 minutes to paddle to the island then 30-40 minutes to return to our launch site. Most guests like to rent our water sport equipment for 2 hours to allow time for the commute and the adventure. 04 Can we fit a cooler in the kayak/canoe? Yes, you can fit a small cooler in our vessels. 05 What kind of bikes do you have? We have beach cruisers and mountain bikes available to rent. The beach cruiser is made for leisurely strolls on the paved roads throughout the park. The mountain bikes come in hardtail or full suspension and can be taken into the mountain bike trail system within the park. 06 What types of activities can I participate in at Oleta River Adventures? At Oleta River Adventures, you can enjoy a variety of outdoor activities, including kayak and canoe rentals, stand-up paddleboarding (SUP), mountain biking, and guided tours. Whether you're looking for a relaxing day on the water or an adventurous trail ride, we have something for everyone. 07 Do I need to make a reservation for rentals and tours, or can I just walk in? We recommend making a reservation in advance, especially during peak times and weekends, to ensure availability of equipment and tour spots. However, walk-ins are welcome based on availability. You can make reservations through our website or by contacting us directly. 08 What types of activities can I participate in at Oleta River Adventures? At Oleta River Adventures, you can enjoy a variety of outdoor activities, including kayak and canoe rentals, stand-up paddleboarding (SUP), mountain biking, and guided tours. Whether you're looking for a relaxing day on the water or an adventurous trail ride, we have something for everyone. 9 Are there age or skill requirements for participating in activities? Most of our activities are suitable for all ages and skill levels. For kayaking and paddleboarding, children under 18 must be accompanied by an adult. We offer beginner-friendly options and provide safety instructions before you start. If you have any concerns about specific activities, please contact us for more information. 10 Do you sell supplies and food? Yes, Oleta River Outdoors has a retail store. 11 What items does the retail store at Oleta River Outdoors sell? Our retail store offers a variety of items, including: Apparel: T-shirts, hats, and water shoes. Outdoor Gear: Sunscreen, hats, sunglasses, and water bags. Snacks and Beverages: Assorted snacks, bottled water, and soft drinks. Protection from the elements: sunscreen, sunblock, and insect repellent 12 Does Oleta River Outdoors offer food? At the moment, we offer snack items.
  • Apparel: T-shirts, hats, and water shoes.
  • Outdoor Gear: Sunscreen, hats, sunglasses, and water bags.
  • Snacks and Beverages: Assorted snacks, bottled water, and soft drinks.
  • Protection from the elements: sunscreen, sunblock, and insect repellent.
  • Hotdogs
  • Cheeseburgers
  • Pulled Pork Sandwiches
  • Chicken Tenders
  • Veggie Burgers
  • Assorted Beverages
  • Ice Cream
  • Cold Drinks
Gallery
